html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Make 2022 the year of good decisions. Start by signing up for our newsletter for twice-weekly tips, reviews and more from our experts.

Below, you'll find our top 10 Amazon deals right now, including one of our favorite headphones, some protective face masks and a travel-ready coffee grinder, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. 

► Cloth masks are no longer recommended to protect against the omicron variant:  Here's how to find the best KN95 masks for kids.

► Accessibility:  Reviewed launches new vertical dedicated to accessibility.

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The 10 best Amazon deals you can get today

1. 15% off: These protective KN95 face masks

Stay protected this winter with these SupplyAid KN95 face masks on sale at Amazon today. Typically listed for $15.99, you can get a five-pack of the masks for 15% off, or $13.65. SupplyAid says the masks come with an exhalation valve to offer better airflow and prevent humidity inside the mask. The developer recommends users store the masks in a dry and ventilated location.

Get the SupplyAid KN95 Face Mask 5-Pack for $13.65 (Save $2.34)

2. Up to 50% off: These ultra-popular Nintendo Switch games

If you got a Nintendo Switch this past holiday season, stock up on these popular games available as digital downloads for major discounts today. Sports fans can get the standard edition of NBA 2K22 , normally priced at $59.99, for 50% off at $30. Not only can you build your own fantasy lineup of current and past NBA stars with the game's MyTEAM mode, but you can also try out MyGM and MyLEAGUE to see what it's like to be a high-rolling team executive. There's also the Nintendo favorite Donkey Kong Country: Tropic Freeze , also normally listed for $59.99 but now on sale for $41.99 thanks to a 30% discount. Roll, bounce and slam your way through numerous colorful levels with DK and his friends, including Diddy Kong, Dixie Kong and the smooth surfing Funky Kong.

Save up to 50% on select Nintendo Switch games

3. Save $90: One of our favorite robot vacuums

We named the Eufy BoostIQ RoboVac 11S as our favorite affordable robot vacuum and right now, it's selling for as low as $139.99. Normally listed for $229.99, you can get this smart appliance in black for 39% off when you add the $60 coupon on the product page to the $30 price cut already active. We love the 11S for its ability to pick up more dirt per run (11.6 grams, specifically) than more expensive models from other developers. Its slim design makes it capable of moving under furniture and it runs quiet, letting you run it while watching TV or getting other work done.

Get the Eufy Boost IQ RoboVac 11S for $139.99 with coupon (Save $90)

4. 26% off: This compact coffee grinder

Make your morning brew however you want wherever you want with the help of the JavaPresse manual coffee grinder. Typically listed for $45.99, this stainless steel accessory can be yours for 33.99, or $12 off. JavaPresse says the device features a built-in adjustable grind selector with numerous manual grind settings for more precision and control. It's also equipped with a professional-grade ceramic conical burr for a consistent grind and heightened flavor in the coffee at home or on the go.

Get the JavaPresse Manual Coffee Grinder for $33.99 (Save $12)

5. Less than $20: This thick yoga mat

Find the most comfort in your search for mindfulness with the Gaiam premium yoga mat, on sale in multiple colors and designs today. Typically listed from $24.98, you can get this 5-millimeter thick mat for as low as $15.10—a 40% discount. Gaiam says the mat is both lightweight and durable, offering additional cushioning with a non-slip surface for better safety. All purchases of the yoga mat come with a free bonus downloadable yoga workout to test it out and reach your fitness goals this year.

Get the Gaiam 5mm Premium Yoga Mat from $15.10 (Save $3.75 to $9.88)

6. 62% off: These multi-surface disinfectant wipes

Keep your home's busiest areas clean with these Lysol disinfectant wipes. You can get 240 of these lemon-scented wipes in a three-pack for $5.94 for a whopping 62% discount through Amazon's Subscribe and Save delivery subscription (or $6.25 without the service). With Subscribe and Save, you can get 5% off the delivery of your first order and up to 15% off repeat deliveries that can be scheduled to arrive anywhere from every two weeks to every six months. Lysol says its wipes kill 99.9% of germs and bacteria on kitchen and bathroom surfaces, while also being three times more durable than paper towels for repeated use. 

Get the Lysol Lemon and Lime Blossom Disinfectant Wipes 3-Pack for $5.94 (Save $9.82)

7. Less than $200: One of our favorite headphones

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for under $190 right now. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancelation that dampened environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $189.99—a $59.01 price cut from the $249 list price.

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $189.99 (Save $59.01)

8. 14% off: This easy-to-use thermometer

Make taking your temperature a breeze with the iHealth No Touch forehead thermometer. Typically listed for $18.46, this home-ready health tool is on sale for $15.90. iHealth says the thermometer works with one-button readings on adults, children and babies. Powered by three AAA batteries, the thermometer has a large LED screen to display readings and uses vibrations to show alerts instead of an obtrusive beeping sound.

Get the iHealth 2020 No Touch Forehead Thermometer for $15.90 (Save $2.56)

9. Less than $500: This colorful 4K TV

Make your favorite shows and movies truly pop with the Hisense Class H9 Quantum Series 4K ULED Smart TV. Normally priced from $649.99, this Android TV can be yours for as low as $499.99 in its 55-inch size. Hisense says its big screen features Dolby vision HDR picture and Dolby Atoms sound technologies for an enhanced viewing experience. It also features Google Assistant built in so you can use the voice-enabled remote to search for downloadable apps or new programs to watch. 

Get the Hisense Class H9 Quantum Series Android 4K ULED Smart TV from $499.99 (Save $90 to $150)

10. 17% off: This drawer-friendly knife organizer

Keep your sharpest utensils safe and easy to find with the Joseph Joseph DrawerStore knife organizer. Typically listed from $11.99, you can get this compact kitchen accessory in blue for $9.99. The brand says its block can fit nine knives up to 9 inches long with a two-tier design so you can place small blades up top and the longer ones at the bottom. You can also hand wash the block, which is best suited for drawers with a minimum height of three inches.

Get the Joseph Joseph DrawerStore Knife Organizer from $9.99 (Save $2)

Amazon deals you may have missed

1. NordicTrack T 6.5 S Treadmill

If you want to stock your home gym but are short on space, the NordicTrack T 6.5 S treadmill is the compact fitness tool you need. Typically listed for $649, this adjustable fitness essential is now 15% off for $549. NordicTrack says the treadmill is made with a SpaceSaver design and EasyLift Assist that lets you fold up the machine after you're done using it. Purchases of the treadmill also include a 30-day membership to the iFIT streaming service, too, so you can stream live and on-demand workouts. 

Get the NordicTrack T 6.5 S Treadmill with 30-Day iFIT Membership for $549 (Save $100)

2. Fitbit Sense Advanced Smartwatch

Keep a close eye on your stress levels this year with the Fitbit Sense smartwatch, on sale for less than $200 today. Normally priced at $299.95, you can get this health device for 33% off, or $199.95. The Sense is one of the best fitness trackers we've ever tested, impressing us with its emphasis on tracking and managing stress via an electrodermal activity sensor and an ECG app that measures the electrical activity of the heart to detect irregular rhythms. We liked how the watch can either take a two-minute measurement to know exactly where your levels are at any point or use the sensor during guided meditations available through the Fitbit app.

Get the Fitbit Sense Advanced Smartwatch for $199.95 (Save $100)

3. Tuft & Needle Products

Upgrade your bedroom set up with 15% off sleep essentials from Tuft & Needle. You can get the Tuft & Needle Original mattress, the best boxed mattress we've ever tried, in its Queen size at $760.75, a discount of $96.75. When we tested the mattress, our tester found it had good edge support and felt firm, and compared the feeling on par with "floating." There's also the Tuft & Needle foam pillow, typically listed from $85 but now available for $72.25. It's one of our favorite pillows, having impressed us with its surface springiness and solid height for side sleepers.

Save 15% on Tuft & Needle sleep essentials

4. Eufy Boost IQ RoboVac 11S MAX

If you're looking for a vacuum with a powerful performance at a great price, the Eufy 11S Max robot vacuum is the perfect pick. The robot vacuum usually runs shoppers $249.99, but Amazon is offering it for $169.99, a 32% discount. The Max is a larger version of our favorite affordable robot vacuum, the Eufy 11S Slim ($139.99), which we adored for its quiet operation and strong self-navigating abilities. We found that the Max has the same ultra-low-profile 2.85-inch size and 100-minute battery life of the 11S Slim, while boasting even more powerful suction.

Get the Eufy By Anker BoostIQ RoboVac 11S MAX for $169.99 (Save $80)

5. Instant Pot Kitchen Appliances

Get all the kitchen functions you need in one complete package with Instant Pot appliances on sale at Amazon today. Where to start? The Instant Vortex Plus air fryer, normally priced at $139.99, is now listed for $99.95 thanks to a price cut of $40.04. Instant Pot says the 10-quart appliance features the brand's proprietary EvenCrisp technology to deep fry with less oil as well as prepare everything from chicken wings to cinnamon buns. There's also the ​​Instant Pot 6-Quart Duo Plus electric pressure cooker, typically listed for $119.99 but now selling for $99.95. The Duo Plus features an easy-to-read display showcasing its 15 customizable smart programs including sauté, cake, grain and yogurt. 

Save up to 29% on Instant Pot kitchen appliances

Other noteworthy Amazon deals we found 

  • Save up to 20% on Fitness Equipment from Bowflex and Schwinn
  • Save up to 46% on Brita water products
  • Febreeze Unstopables Fresh Small Spaces Air Freshener for $8.97 with coupon code (Save $5.53)
  • Mallory 26-Inch 532 Cool-Force Snowbrush with Ice Scraper for $10.99 (Save $1.46)
  • Tessan Power Strip for $16.19 with coupon (Save $3.80)
  • Philips Norelco MG3750/60 Multigroomer for $17.50 (Save $3.49)
  • Renpho ES-CS20M Smart Bluetooth Body Fat Scale for $24.69 with coupon (Save $12.30)
  • On/Go at-Home COVID-19 Rapid Antigen Self-Test 2-Pack for $24.88 (Save $15.11)
  • ThisWorx Car Vacuum Cleaner for $30.39 with coupon (Save $14.58)
  • Renpho Eye Massager for $64.39 with coupon (Save $15.60)
  • Dreo 4-Quart Air Fryer for $68.95 (Save $21.04)
  • Amazon Fire HD 10 Tablet for $94.99 (Save $95)
  • Noco Boost Plus GB40 1000 Amp 12-Volt Jump Starter Box for $99.95 (Save $26)
  • Bose Sleepbuds II for $199 (Save $50)
  • Bissell ProHeat 2X Revolution Max Clean Pet Pro Carpet Cleaner for $278.99 (Save $30)
  • Omega Juicer Extractor and Nutrition System for $329.99 (Save $50)
  • KitchenAid Artisan Series 5-Quart Stand Mixer from $429 (Save $30.04 to $30.99)
  • LG 55-Inch NanoCell 90 Series 4K Smart UHD TV for $896.99 (Save $203)
  • Samsung HW-Q900A 7.1.2ch Soundbar for $1,147.99 (Save $152)
  • NordicTrack Commercial Series 1750 Treadmill with 30-Day iFit Membership for $1,599 (Save $400)

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.

This article originally appeared on Reviewed: Updated daily: Here are the 10 best Amazon deals today in January 2022
